Changed: Replaced openai.api_key assignment with openai.OpenAI initialization in open_ai_client.py

Added: Created markdown_viewer.py for rendering CHANGELOG.md in HTML format
Added templates folder with index.html for displaying rendered markdown content
Dependencies: fastapi, jinja2, markdown, python-multipart, uvicorn

Removed: Excluded various file types and directories like markdown files, lock files, configuration files, JSON files, YAML files, Dockerfile, environment files, GitHub-related files, Husky configuration files, documentation files, test files, image files (png, jpg, jpeg, gif, svg, ico), PDF files, and spreadsheet files (xlsx, csv).

Added: Created a new file clients/open_ai_client.py to handle interactions with OpenAI API
Imported necessary modules for OpenAI interaction
Configured OpenAI API with the provided API key
Created a new file 'commit_service.py' in the 'services' directory
Added configuration for OpenAI API key
Ignored Python-generated files and virtual environments in .gitignore
Created main.py with commands for saying hello and goodbye
Added pyproject.toml with project metadata and dependencies
